buyTokens(address,uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Buy tokens using ETH with World ID verification

params.nullifierHash: The nullifier hash for this proof
params.root: The World ID root to verify against
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to buy

buyTokensExact(address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Buy specific amount of tokens with World ID verification

params.nullifierHash: The nullifier hash for this proof
params.root: The World ID root to verify against
params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to buy

calculateEthAmount(uint256,uint256,uint2.details: Calculate ETH amount for given tokens using bonding curve

calculateTokenAmount(uint256,uint256,uin.details: Calculate token amount for given ETH using bonding curve

params._action: The World ID Action (from Developer Portal)
params._appId: The World ID App ID (from Developer Portal)
params._tokenCreationAction: The World ID Action for token creation (from Developer Portal)
params._worldId: The address of the WorldIDRouter that will verify the proofs

createToken(string,string,string,uint256.details: Create a new token with bonding curve

params.name: Token name
params.nullifierHash: The nullifier hash for this proof
params.root: The World ID root to verify against

getEthRequiredForTokens(address,uint256).details: Get ETH amount required to buy specific number of tokens (including fees)

getTokenCreationCooldown(uint256).details: Get when a user can create their next token

returns.canCreateNow: True if user can create a token now
returns.nextCreationTime: Timestamp when user can create next token (0 if can create now)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokenAddress: Address of the token to sell

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

DailyLimitExceededError().notice: Thrown when daily mint limit is exceeded

InvalidMintAmount().notice: Thrown when attempting to reuse a nullifier

TokenCreationCooldownNotMet().notice: Thrown when token creation cooldown is not met
